file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-31-01-04 - BAGGAGE LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the baggage light lamp and baggage light assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-31-01-000-801-A BAGGAGE LIGHT LAMP - REMOVAL ALL 33-31-01-400-801-A BAGGAGE LIGHT LAMP - INSTALLATION ALL 33-31-01-000-802-A BAGGAGE LIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL BAGGAGE LIGHT ASSEMBLY - INSTAL- ALL 33-31-01-400-802-A LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-31-01 Page 1 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-31-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. BAGGAGE LIGHT LAMP - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the baggage light lamp. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 273 Baggage compartment 274 Baggage compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the ceiling of the baggage compart- 1 Does the task ment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the COMPT circuit breaker (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/COMPT) and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), open the COMPT circuit breaker ( Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/COMPT) and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the four dzus-type screws (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-31-01 Page 2 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the protection (4). (3) Remove the lens (3). (4) Remove the seal (2). (5) Remove the lamp (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-31-01 Page 3 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Baggage Light Lamp - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B ZONES 273 274 A FWD DET. A 2. SEAL 1. LAMP 3. LENS 4. PROTECTION 5. DZUS (4) DET. B 145AMM330110.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-31-01 Page 4 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-31-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. BAGGAGE LIGHT LAMP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the baggage light lamp. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 BAGGAGE AND SERVICE COMPARTMENT LIGHTS - AMM TASK 33-30-00-700-801-A/500 OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 273 Baggage compartment 274 Baggage compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the ceiling of the baggage compart- 1 Does the task ment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the lamp (1). (2) Install the seal (2). (3) Install the lens (3). (4) Install the protection (4). (5) Attach the four dzus-type screws (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-31-01 Page 5 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from the COMPT circuit breaker (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/COMPT) and close it. (2) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from the COMPT circuit breaker ( Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/COMPT) and close it. (3) Do the Baggage Compartment Light test ( AMM TASK 33-30-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-31-01 Page 6 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-31-01-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. BAGGAGE LIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the baggage light assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 AMM TASK 25-51-01-000-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LINING - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 273 Baggage compartment 274 Baggage compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the ceiling of the baggage compart- 1 Does the task ment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the COMPT circuit breaker (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/COMPT) and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), open the COMPT circuit breaker ( Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/COMPT) and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (3) Refer to AMM TASK 25-51-01-000-801-A/400 and remove the baggage compartment lining and the light cover to get access to the baggage light assembly. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-31-01 Page 7 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Release the four dzus-type screws (7). (2) Remove the protection (6). (3) Remove the lens (5). (4) Remove the seal (4). (5) Remove the three screw (1), and three washer (2) that attach the baggage light assembly to the lining. (6) Release the sleeve (10). (7) Release the two terminal sleeve (9). (8) Disconnect the two terminal wire (8). (9) Remove the baggage light assembly (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-31-01 Page 8 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Baggage Light Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 402 B ZONES 273 274 A FWD 1. SCREW DET. A C 2. WASHER 3. BAGGAGE LIGHT ASSEMBLY 10. SLEEVE LINING (REF.) 9. TERMINAL SLEEVE (2) 8. TERMINAL WIRE 4. SEAL 5. LENS DET. C 6. PROTECTION 7. DZUS (4) DET. B 145AMM330471.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-31-01 Page 9 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-31-01-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. BAGGAGE LIGHT ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Baggage Light Assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 AMM TASK 25-51-01-400-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LINING - INSTALLATION BAGGAGE AND SERVICE COMPARTMENT LIGHTS - AMM TASK 33-30-00-700-801-A/500 OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 273 Baggage compartment 274 Baggage compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the ceiling of the baggage compart- 1 Does the task ment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Connect the two terminal wire (8) to the baggage light assembly (1). (2) Install the terminal sleeve (9). (3) Install the sleeve (10). (4) Put the baggage light assembly (3) in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-31-01 Page 10 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Tighten the three screw (1), and three washer (2) that attach the baggage light assembly (3) to the lining. (6) Install the seal (2). (7) Install the lens (3). (8) Install the protection (4). (9) Attach the four dzus-type screws (5). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Refer to AMM TASK 25-51-01-400-801-A/400 and install the light cover and the baggage compartment lining. (2) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from the COMPT circuit breaker (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/COMPT) and close it. (3) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from the COMPT circuit breaker ( Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/COMPT) and close it. (4) Do the Baggage Compartment Light test ( AMM TASK 33-30-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-31-01 Page 11 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
